ai-mil3.7.7:0.3_0: How on the meritoriously to those who have little merit,
ai-mil3.7.7:1.2_0: “Reverend Sir, did you more merit or more of an elephant?”
ai-mil3.7.7:1.5_0: “Great king, I’ve done bad deeds, and do not get done bad deeds.
ai-mil3.7.7:1.6_0: But when you have no regrets, joy springs up. Being joyful, rapture springs up. When the mind is full of rapture, the body becomes tranquil. When the body is tranquil, you feel bliss. And when you’re blissful, the mind becomes immersed. When your body is tranquil, you feel bliss. And when you’re blissful, you truly know and see that your mind becomes immersed.
ai-mil3.7.7:1.7_0: But a person whose hands and feet have come up to one side, and they won’t come alone for the Buddha.
ai-mil3.7.7:1.8_0: And for this reason I make much merit.”
ai-mil3.7.7:3.1_0: the seventh (whole) meritorious (somethings) is the seventh (back):
